name: Words - Word search puzzles
description:
Consider yourself smart? Check out your word stock playing the game Words!

Words is all about connecting scrambled letters in attempt to guess correct words. Easy, right? It is actually, when you have two or three letters to form a word. Let's see how free and easy this is going to be with five or six letter words. Don't you worry! Nothing is impossible! A fresh mind and everyday practice for twenty minutes are going to help you handle such tasks at a blink of an eye!

Are you really that fast as you believe? Challenge your guessing speed in final levels of every block! That is going to be awesome mind training!

FEATURES:
- User friendly interface
- Three difficulty modes: School, College and University
- Hundreds of fascinating levels
- Speed guessing levels to figure out how fast you are
- Special levels with extra bonuses
- Gifts, awards, rewards and other fabby little things

Brush up your vocabulary with Words right away!
